alert.note: Alert for Adair; Chariton; Howard; Linn; Macon; Randolph; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 7:27PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Adair, Chariton, Randolph, southeastern Linn, northern Howard, northeastern Saline and Macon Counties through 800 PM CST... At 726 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of La Plata to near Slater. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moberly, Macon, Marceline, Slater, Salisbury, Huntsville, La Plata, Glasgow, Bevier, Higbee, Keytesville, Bucklin, Atlanta, Clark, Callao, Cairo, Armstrong, Brashear, Gilliam and New Cambria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central, north central and northeastern Missouri.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Chariton; Howard; Linn; Macon; Randolph; Saline
